about.title: Read News App
about.description1: Mobile app to explore recent headlines, follow articles and read them with a clean, fast and distraction-free interface.
about.description2: Uses The Guardian public API for real-time search, on-demand loading and tab navigation optimized for iOS and Android.
about.authorBody: Project developed by Ramses Gonzalez for Conexa as a sample of React Native + Expo architecture, state managed with hooks and reusable patterns for editorial products.
about.toolsBody: Built with Expo Router for tab/stack routes, React Query for news & users, Zustand + AsyncStorage for auth, Yup validations and Jest + Testing Library for coverage.
about.featuresDescription: Key pieces implemented for the technical exercise:
features: Auth flow with validated forms, global state in Zustand and persistence through AsyncStorage.
Separated tab access: Home/About always public, Login only when signed out, Bookmarks/Users/Profile only when authenticated.
Home screen covered with Jest + Testing Library, mocking hooks and asserting real TextInput interactions.
News and users fed by React Query plus API services wired via Babel/js.config aliases.
Reusable UI set (InputSearch, AnimatedIconButton, Skeletons, etc.) with centralized theming and lightweight animations.
